title: HP LIFE - Courses (English)
description: A program of the HP Foundation, this collection of short introductory courses helps adults learn independently various digital and entrepreneurship skills, including information technology, starting a business, online sales, and marketing. Appropriate for adults who are curious to develop their professional skills or simply learn about new opportunities.

children.title: Inventory management
Story
children.description: How can Ahmed and Moshen keep track of how much inventory they have on hand?

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Learn how to manage your inventory to make your business more successful.

children.title: Technology Skill
children.description: Learn how to use different technologies to manage your inventory.

files.path: chefdata/Courses/en/Inventory management/content/downloads/Downloadable - Inventory Management Technology Resource Links.pdf

children.title: Next Steps
children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

Learn why inventory management is essential to maintaining successful business operations and maximizing profit. Learn how to: • Choose the best method of inventory management for your business • Use different technologies to manage your inventory

children.title: IT for business success
Story
children.description: Tarek and Jamel face choices around the best technology projects for their travel agency.

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Learn how to choose technology solutions that could benefit your business most.

children.title: Technology Skill
children.description: Learn how to choose the best approach when implementing technology.

children.title: Next Steps
children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

Learn how to: • Determine the types of technology solutions that best address your business goals • Decide the best way to implement a technology solution given the circumstances of your particular business

children.title: Business email
Story
children.description: DJ Vijay Singh wonders why potential clients aren't responding to his emails.

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Explore how to write effective business emails.

children.title: Technology Skill
children.description: Learn the parts of an email, how to address an email, how to add an attachment, and how to create an email signature.

children.title: Next Steps
children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

Learn how to create professional and appropriate business emails. Learn how to: • Recognize the dos and don’ts of business email • Address an email • Add an attachment to an email • Create an email signature

children.title: Sales forecasting
Story
children.description: How can Walid predict how many sales he’ll make each month?

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Learn how to gather important information to make your business sales forecast.

children.title: Technology Skill
children.description: Learn how to customize a spreadsheet that helps you forecast your sales.

children.title: Next Steps
children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

Learn how to gather important information to create your sales forecast and how to document your sales forecast using spreadsheet software. Learn how to: • Gather information to make a sales forecast for your business • Use spreadsheet software to track your sales forecast

children.title: Effective business websites
Story
children.description: How can Walid build a website that meets his business goals?

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Learn how to create a user-friendly website that meets your business goals by effectively reaching your target audience.

children.title: Technology Skill
children.description: Learn how to use online web design software to create a website for your business.

chefdata/Courses/en/Effective business websites/content/downloads/Downloadable - Website User Experience Best Practices.pdf

children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

Learn how to build a website that effectively meets your business goals and how to use a web tool to create a website. Learn how to: • Create a user-friendly website that meets your business goals and effectively reaches your target audience • Use online web design software to create a website for your business

children.title: Selling online
Story
children.description: Mariam realizes that she has run out of new customers in her local area and needs to find new places to sell her bags.

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Explore the elements of online product listings and learn how to create listings that are compelling to potential customers.

children.title: Technology Skill
children.description: Learn the basics of how to edit photographs using photo-editing software.

children.title: New Steps
children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

Learn how to maximize the effectiveness of your online product listings. Learn how to: • Create effective titles, descriptions, and photographs for your online product listing • Improve your products’ photographs using photo-editing software

children.title: Marketing benefits vs. features
Story
children.description: How can Wassim market his products more effectively?

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Learn how to effectively promote the advantages of your products or services to your target market.

children.title: Technology Skill
children.description: Learn how to use a word processing template to create a flyer for your business.

children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

Learn how to effectively promote the advantages of your products or services to help you increase sales. Learn how to use templates to create marketing materials. Learn how to: • Understand the difference between the benefits and features of your products or services and effectively promote them to your target market • Use online templates to create a flyer for your business

children.title: Energy efficiency - Do more for less

children.title: Success mindset
Story
children.description: Gianna achieved her dream to have her own workshop and showroom to create and sell woodworking art and furniture.

children.title: Business Concept
children.description: Learn how to create a vision for your future, goals and a success plan.

children.title: 3D Printing

children.title: Design Thinking

children.description: Understand the design thinking process and how the process can be used to understand problems, create and test possible solutions.

Learn basic concepts to identify, define, explore, generate and test ideas to solve difficult problems. Users will develop a working knowledge of the design thinking process. Learn how to: • Define a problem and create a problem statement • Conduct interviews to learn about potential customers and understand their problem or unmet need • Explore the problem to deepen your understanding • Generate and test solutions to solve the problem

children.title: Next Steps
children.description: Discover next steps in this course and additional resources. Please note the links on this page will not work unless you are connected to the internet. Use the right-click button, and choose "Open in new tab" to open the links.

If you are thinking about starting a small business, learn about the basic steps for starting a business, including developing business ideas, conducting market research, business planning, and using metrics to measure business success. Explore • Entrepreneurship • Steps to starting a business • My Business Plan – a tool to help you create a business plan • Metrics to measure business success
